pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, May 10, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual discussion with nurses and nursing students from across Manitoba in recognition of National Nursing Week. He will be joined by Special Representative for the Prairies Jim Carr, Minister of Northern Affairs Dan Vandal, Member of Parliament for Winnipeg South Terry Duguid, and Member of Parliament for Winnipeg North Kevin Lamoureux.

The discussion will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/CanadianPM

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister, along with Member of Parliament for Brampton West Kamal Khera, will virtually visit a pop-up vaccination clinic site at the Brampton Islamic Centre.

The visit will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/CanadianPM

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
